item.description:
** PLEASE NOTE ** specials run until 8pm. find me (ben) when you arrive and i'll give you a bracelet so you can get the specials (this is the way black bear wants to do it).

Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Black Bear Saloon

Black Bear just opened on the 16th, and is located where Neat Lounge used to be on the corner of Temple and Crown streets. they seem to have done a pretty nice job renovating it, with a large bar area and large floor-to-ceiling windows that open wide to let in the breeze. here's an article in play magazine (thanks michelle).

this week's specials are:

$3 draft beer (16 beers on tap)
$3 bottled beer
$3 well drinks (excludes red bull drinks, long island iced teas, high-shelf stuff)
$0.25 wings (min 12)

your contact for the night: Ben (203) 554-5144

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***

Post-party location TBD.
item.name: 4/30 - Monday Happy Hour - Black Bear Saloon
